basic_info.name: Jim Walton
basic_info.summary: James Carr Walton (born June 7, 1948) is an American businessman, currently an heir to the fortune of Walmart, the world's largest retailer. As of February 2025, Walton was the 12th-richest person in the world, with a net worth of US$118.9 billion according to Forbes. He is the youngest son of Sam Walton.
